title: Would love some logo feedback (also looking to hire designer for touch ups)
content:
Here's the logo and some additional information: [http://i.imgur.com/90M7zzt.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317195814/http:/i.imgur.com/90M7zzt.png "http://i.imgur.com/90M7zzt.png")

For those interested in the job (contact me at [cwrichardkim@gmail.com](mailto:cwrichardkim@gmail.com)):  
The Old  
We find that our current logo has a range of issues:  
1) It’s too bland. We strived for simple, but ended up with bland.  
2) Unrelatable to our primary audience (college students)  
3) We strove for: Sleek, high quality, class, professional, fun

The New  
We’re looking for a new identity for our upcoming expansion  
1) Color scheme. Finding a color scheme that fits us is our primary mission. The colors have to work across the platform  
2) More fun while keeping the quality. Our userbase consists primarily of college students looking for a pizza deal and an upcoming concert. We’re looking for a way to keep the sleek and simple image but add a splash of personality  
3) Minimal changes to the current logo. We still want our image to be continuous and recognizable after the change  
4) Adjectives: Sleek, simple, fun, reliable, likable, lighthearted, going out

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317195814im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Desktop%20HD_6482.png)
author: cwrichardkim
